name: Get High (Shot out games)
description:
• Press W to catch-up and out climb every opponent to the top. Only one minute to the top. (I wanted to implement a timer)
  • Keep an eye on your energy level at all times
  • Slowly lose energy as you climb
  • Use energy by pressing Space to boost and catch-up to your opponents
  • Blast your opponents to steal their energy but beware of opponents who can blast you
  • Bounce shots for big energy boosts and freeze enemies for a second
  • Finish first for guaranteed 150K. All scores saved and your score is ranked each time. Can you score 175K ? 
  • XBox Controls (Note: if using game-pad because of bug  Mouse required to select High Score Menu
    • Right Trigger to shoot in the direction the player is facing
    • Button X to boost up quickly
